Edreys Wajed, ónyé a makwaara dị ka Billy Drease Williams bụ ónyé America na-ese hip hop, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'agụ egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe si Buffalo, New York; a maara ya maka mmepụta ngwa ngwa ya, okwu dị ọcha, na ozi na-akpali akpali

Billy Drease Williams malitere dị ka akụkụ nke otu hip hop dị mkpirikpi a na-akpọ The Elements (nke ndị otu Soulive bụ Alan Evans na Neal Evans guzobere) ma mesịa bụrụ otu ọkara nke duo a maara dị ka Raw Intel (ya na onye na-emepụta Trevor "TrevThorne" Drayton)
Ónyé a ma ama na-enyocha egwu Jeff Miers akọwaala ya dị ka ónyé na-ekwe nkwa, onye na-eme njem, ónyé na'echiche hip hop ónyé na-ese ihe na Buffalo emepụtala.

Raw Intel nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge, na-etinye egwu ise na ESPN NFL 2K5 Video Game, ma na-emepụta obéré ihe a ma ama ma bụrụ nke a na-eto nke ọma na 2002/2003. Billy Drease sokwa Soulive rụkọọ ọrụ ọzọ màkà Turn It Out Remixed Album ma wepụta ọrụ na Velour Records na ónyé na-akụ egwu Alan Evans, nke akpọrọ M.E.K.A
A na-eme emume nka nke Hip Hop dị ka ihe omume / emume na Buffalo n'afọ ndị gárá aga, ma ugbu a ọ nọ na nke ise.
